entries.title: Statistical Publications: Overview - www-snb-ch
entries.text: Reports, focus articles, press releases and data. The SNB publishes statistical data in reports, focus articles, press releases and on its data portal.

entries.title: Monthly Statistical Bulletin - www-snb-ch
entries.text: The publication 'Monthly Statistical Bulletin' was discontinued in September 2015. The relevant data can be consulted and downloaded via the SNB data portal.

entries.title: Statistics - www-snb-ch
entries.text: On the data.snb.ch data portal, the SNB publishes data of importance for monitoring the economy as well as for monetary policy.

entries.title: The SNB's monetary policy | Swiss National Bank
entries.text: The SNB's monetary policy strategy consists of three elements: a definition of price stability, a medium-term inflation forecast and the SNB policy rate.

entries.title: The implementation of monetary policy | Swiss National Bank
entries.text: Here you will find all of the SNB's monetary policy decisions, sorted by year.

entries.title: The SNB's monetary policy strategy | Swiss National Bank
entries.text: The objective of the SNB's monetary policy is to ensure price stability in the medium and long term. Short-term price fluctuations, however, cannot be ...
